input.sentences: did you bring anything to smoke | he asked .
nope | but i got some beer this friend told him .
[male] said | he knew where to get something .
[male] | the dude with the mustache had some .
output.sentences: My friends were trying to stop their smoke habit, so I asked them to not bring cigarettes to the party.
I told them, "nope!  You are my friend, and I are."
One male I'd never met kept acting like he knew me.
He introduced me to a mustached male, and I said, "Dude, I know youre trying to distract me so they can smoke."
Either way I was glad to be introduced to all of the cool, new people.
